description: Organisations with six or more vehicles can set up Fleet Auto Pay

We'll automatically record the number of charging days a vehicle travels within the charging zone and bill you each month.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["£10.50 daily Congestion Charge per vehicle, rather than £11.50","Pay by direct debit","Less time spent on administration","Online account management and telephone helpline","Protection from Penalty Charge Notices\u003cstrong\u003e \u003c/strong\u003e while registered"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Unlimited number of vehicles","Add extra vehicles to your service on a one-off basis","Up to five account users can help you manage the service"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Complete a Direct Debit mandate as part of your application","Provide us with certain documents about your company","Be over 18"]}
Your first payment by direct debit will include:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["£10 annual registration charge for each vehicle added to Fleet Auto Pay","Any journey charges you have incurred since activating your service"]}
Your Fleet Auto Pay may be suspended if we can't collect a payment. Check regularly to make sure you can cover the payment.
We renew your vehicles automatically - the £10 annual registration charge will apply for each vehicle registered for Fleet Auto Pay.
Make sure you remove a vehicle from Fleet Auto Pay if you don't want to renew it. Do it before the vehicle's renewal date or you'll pay the £10 registration charge again.
See our Fleet Auto Pay terms and conditions .
